name: Quizlet DarkSkin | v0.3.5
description:
Trigstur's Quizlet DarkSkin | By : Trigstur | Version : 0.3.5 | Bugs can occur frequently
If you have any issues please contact me on discord > Trigstur#5919
additional_info:
Mega update coming soon... stay tuned

style_setting_options.label: Yes

style_setting_options.label: Yes
